titleStmt.title: John J. Crittenden et al. to Larz Anderson
CWG1429

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p:
To Mr Lars Anderson,
Cincinnati, Ohio

Tell Genl Anderson, if he is with, you that we desire to see to see him here immediately -- We have talked with the Governor -- He does not disapprove of this invitation -- High public interests require the General's presence here If your brother is not with you, where is he? answer immediately --
J J Crittenden
August 22nd 1861
Mason Brown
Orlando Brown
P. Swigert

49 F 16 pd
56 F 183 pd
Chg -- State
